questions.question: BFSK has a ______ bandwidth than BPSK.
questions.explanation: The Bandwidth for PSK is fb and for FSK is 2(∆f+f_b). Hence the bandwidth of FSK is higher than PSK.

questions.question: FSK reception is deployed using
questions.explanation: Demodulation of FSK signal can be performed by using correlation receiver and phase locked loop

questions.question: Mark and space are represented in BFSK using
questions.explanation: In BFSK, mark represents 1 and space represents 0

questions.question: The data pattern used for generation of FSK will be
questions.explanation: In BFSK, the input bits are coded by a line coding format where mark values are represented by positive voltage and space values are represented by negative voltage called Non Return to Zero(NRZ) pattern.

questions.question: The range of frequency used in BFSK is
questions.explanation: Frequency deviation, ∆f=|f_m-f_s |/2 ; where f_m=49kHz and f_s=51kHz therefore ∆f=1kHz.Minimum bandwidth, B=2(∆f+f_b); where fb=2kbps, therefore B=2(1k+2k)=6kHz.
